snippet: During cross-examination in her murder trial on Friday, Gigi Jordan answered a prosecutor’s questions in a way that appeared to undermine her explanation for why she killed her 8-year-old son.
abstract: Lead prosecutor in case against Gigi Jordan, who is on trial for killing her 8-year-old son Jude Mirra in 2010, raises questions about the reliability of Jordan's claim that her son had been abused by his father, her second husband.
lead_paragraph: During cross-examination in her murder trial on Friday, Gigi Jordan answered a prosecutor’s questions in a way that appeared to undermine her explanation for why she killed her 8-year-old son.

headline.main: Challenges to Mother’s Defense for Killing Son
headline.print_headline: Challenges to Mother’s Defense for Killing Son
